title: Naseej UAE | Sustainable Textiles, Heritage & Circular Future
description: Discover how Naseej is shaping the UAE’s textile future, preserving Emirati heritage, driving textile recycling, and building a sustainable, circular economy.

ogMeta.title: Naseej — Textiles carry our heritage, let’s give them a future
ogMeta.description: Every garment tells a story. Every fabric holds value. Naseej is the UAE’s national initiative on textile circularity, keeping textiles in use and weaving a circular future for the UAE.

bannerSection.heading:
TEXTILES CARRY

OUR HERITAGE
bannerSection.subHeading: let’s give them A FUTURE
bannerSection.description: Every garment tells a story. Every fabric holds value. Together, we can keep textiles in use and weave a circular future for the UAE.

storySection.storyHeading: In the UAE’s past, textiles were made to last
storySection.storyDescription:
Bedouin women wove Sadu patterns from camel and goat hair, creating designs that held both beauty and meaning.

​Garments were stitched by hand, worn with pride, and patched when they tore.

When they no longer fit, they were passed on to the next family. Mending and reusing were gestures of care and traditions that kept stories alive.
storySection.storyContentCircleText: UAE’S HERITAGE<colored color="#E61717"> OF TEXTILE CARE</colored>

messageSection.messageHeading:
WE ARE AT

THE CROSSROADS
messageSection.messageDescription: From a heritage of care to the crossroads we face today, the choice is clear How do we make it happen? This is where the story of Naseej begins
messageSection.messageSnakeText: Textiles carry our heritage Let’s give them a future

storyContentSection.storyContentHeading: ​Today, the story of textiles in the UAE has changed
storyContentSection.storyContentDescription1: By choosing timeless quality and consciously reducing what we acquire.
storyContentSection.storyContentDescription2: By repairing what is imperfect and reimagining garments in new, creative ways.
storyContentSection.storyContentDescription3: By donating with purpose and celebrating the character of pre-loved treasures.
storyContentSection.storyContentDescription4: By upcycling pieces into something new and keeping fibres in motion.
storyContentSection.storyContentCircleText: THE CURRENT PATH,<colored color="#E61717"> OUR REALITY TODAY</colored>

storyPathOfPossibilitySection.storyPathOfPossibilityHeading: ​But it doesn’t have to be this way
storyPathOfPossibilitySection.storyPathOfPossibilityDescription2:
By choosing timeless quality and consciously reducing what we acquire.

By repairing what is imperfect and reimagining garments in new, creative ways.

By donating with purpose and celebrating the character of pre-loved treasures.

By upcycling pieces into something new and keeping fibres in motion.

messageTextileCarrySection.messageTextileCarryHeading:
WE ARE WEAVING

A NATIONAL PATH

TOGETHER
messageTextileCarrySection.messageTextileCarryDescription: Naseej is the UAE’s national initiative on textile circularity that brings together communities, industry, and government to transform the story of waste into our new fabric of possibility.
messageTextileCarrySection.messageTextileCarrySnakeText: Textiles carry our heritage Let’s give them a future

ourVisionSection.ourVisionDescription: Naseej envisions a UAE where individuals and communities lead the shift to textile circularity — embedding sustainable choices into everyday lives.

ourMissionSection.ourMissionDescription: To accelerate the UAE’s transition to textile circularity by empowering communities through awareness, strategic partnerships, accessible recycling solutions, and supportive policies that establish sustainable practices as the norm.

item1.title: Collection & recycling
item1.description: Enhancing infrastructure for efficient textile collection, sorting, and recycling to prevent landfill waste.

item2.title: Community awareness
item2.description: Driving a shift in public habits and practices through public campaigns and educational initiatives.

item3.title: market intelligence
item3.description: Conducting research on consumer behaviour and market trends to inform strategy.

item4.title: Policies & regulations
item4.description: Advocating for national targets and incentives to support textile circularity.

item5.title: Circular business
item5.description: Supporting startups and SMEs in developing innovative textile solutions.

fabricOfPossibilitySection.fabricOfPossibilityHeading:
Your Role

In the Fabric

Of Possibility
fabricOfPossibilitySection.fabricOfPossibilityDescription: Each of us can play a part in turning textiles into lasting value and building a circular economy in the UAE.
fabricOfPossibilitySection.fabricOfPossibilitySnakeText: Textiles carry our heritage Let’s give them a future

stakeholdersSection.heading: Your role in the fabric of possibility
stakeholdersSection.description: Each of us can play a part in turning textiles into lasting value and building a circular economy in the UAE.

communities.title: For communities
communities.description: Extend the life of your garments. Repair, donate, or recycle them with purpose. Every choice keeps a story alive.

industries.title: For industry
industries.description: Lead the circular shift. Join the national coalition, pilot new models, and access practical tools for change.

researchersAndMedia.title: For Researchers
researchersAndMedia.description: Build the blueprint for tomorrow. Explore insights, guide policy, and shape national initiatives.

media.title: For media
media.description: Tell the stories that matter. Share knowledge, spark dialogue, and inspire public understanding.

commitmentSection.heading: A National commitment
commitmentSection.description: Naseej is powered by a dedicated coalition of the UAE’s leaders, innovators, and community builders.

footer.footerJoinText: Join us in building the UAE's circular textile economy.

item1.label: CONSUMPTION
item1.text: million of textile pieces are consumed annually in the UAE.

item2.label: IMPACT
item2.text: tons of textiles are discarded every year.

item3.label: WASTE
item3.text: of discarded textiles end up in landfills, burying their story forever.

item4.label: AWARENESS
item4.text: of us believe fashion's impact is positive, unaware of the hidden environmental cost.

item5.label: UTILISATION
item5.text: of garments are rarely worn and nearly half are discarded within a year.
